# segmentStyle

**Instance Property**

The visual style used to display the segmented control.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var segmentStyle: NSSegmentedControl.Style { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains an `NSSegmentStyle` value that specifies the visual display used by the control.

## Related Documentation

- **NSSegmentedControl.Style**: The following constants specify the visual style used to display the segmented control. They are used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSegmentedControl/segmentStyle].

## Specifying Segment Visual Styles

- **interiorBackgroundStyle(forSegment:)**: Returns the interior background style for the specified segment.
